HR Assistant Job at Musada Hotels and Luxury Suites




        
    

        
        Musada Hotels and Luxury Suites is a 4-star hotel offering a vast array of hospitality services in the heart of Abuja. We offer luxury and top-notch services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: HR Assistant
Job Location: Abuja (FCT)

Job Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Maintain and update staff files and HR records.
	Assist with recruitment, onboarding, and staff documentation.
	Track staff attendance, leave requests, and approvals.
	Support payroll preparation and staff welfare activities.
	Assist with HR reports and internal communications.
	Handle general HR administrative tasks as assigned.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND/HND/BSc in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field.
	Previous HR or administrative experience (hotel experience is an advantage).
	Good communication and organizational skills.
	Ability to handle confidential information.
	Basic knowledge of Microsoft Office.
	Strong organizational skills and the ability to maintain confidentiality.
	Must be reliable and detail-oriented.


Eligibility Criteria


	This role is open to Female applicants only.
	Applicants must currently reside in Abuja, FCT.
	Candidates based outside Abuja will not be considered.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV in PDF format only to: people@musadahotels.com with the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Job Position: Business Development Manager

	Be responsible for developing and maintaining cooperative relationships with local mobile Internet apps in Nigeria.
	Deliver built-in cooperation with local mobile internet giants, integrating their services into TEX AI ecosystem platform via API/agent-to-agent/MCP.
	Focus on expanding cooperation with local life service apps, covering scenarios including but not limited to food delivery, ride-hailing, operator recharge, e-commerce, business travel, etc.
	Gain an in-depth understanding of the Internet ecosystem, user needs, and AI technical trends in Nigeria, explore potential cooperation opportunities and bring deliverables.
	Monitor and collect competitors&rsquo; AI-related successful cases and investigate the potential of launching similar cooperation promptly.
	Develop and formulate the decision-making chain of KA, maintain a good relationship with KA&rsquo;s decision maker, and know how to approach them effectively.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor`s Degree with 2 - 5 years of experience.
	Enthusiasm in cutting-edge AI technology and news.
	Skilled communication and coordination.
	Excellent in Microsoft PPT, excel, word, etc.
	Willingness to build a better world driven by high technologies.
	Working experience in Nigeria&#39;s top mobile internet company will be a plus. (uber/ bolt/ glovo/ chaw deck/ sportify /opay/ palmpay/ moniepoint, etc.).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager
